project.name: J-C190B-CMUD-09-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF01-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32767 or 32766, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an infinite loop.

iopair.name: J-C190B-CMUD-09-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_oKEngD6bxMRU5ZFveSxt AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_FXk4RvzIZR OR (NOT finished_YDOfhF1JLs AND NOT (controlled_exit_GsvBJElHBn OR continued_execution_yFaTPWhySD)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_FXk4RvzIZR OR (NOT finished_YDOfhF1JLs AND NOT (controlled_exit_GsvBJElHBn OR continued_execution_yFaTPWhySD))) OR controlled_exit_GsvBJElHBn)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_FXk4RvzIZR OR (NOT finished_YDOfhF1JLs AND NOT (controlled_exit_GsvBJElHBn OR continued_execution_yFaTPWhySD)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_FXk4RvzIZR OR (NOT finished_YDOfhF1JLs AND NOT (controlled_exit_GsvBJElHBn OR continued_execution_yFaTPWhySD))) OR controlled_exit_GsvBJElHBn))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
